pages.text: The Lava Cake Strain$(br2)Base THC: 22% $(br)Base CBD: 3% $(br)Effect: Glowing
Lava Cake Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Lava Cake Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Lava Cake Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Lava Cake Weed in an Extractor
You can package your lava cake weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
